subject: Re: Some new files from the 12-469 Old Style RS Box
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:

That "No. They have you." file is very good.  Any idea what that means?

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
> I did my first session in a week and got a couple good files, please

recording 
> an EVP Maker session in MP3 format and play it back later plugged 
into 
> speakers through an MP3 player while asking questions.  I had 
attempted 
> it about a year ago with minimal success.  I think they need the live 
> stream, but if anybody is willing to test it out i would love to hear
